articles.title: 'Parrot Fever' outbreak in Europe kills 5 people: Know causes, symptoms and treatment of psittacosis - India TV News
articles.description: The recent deaths caused by 'parrot fever' in Europe serve as a stark reminder of the importance of being knowledgeable about diseases that can be passed from animals to humans.
